data.title: Windermere Real Estate
authors: Michael Bauer - Medford - - Windermere - - Windermere Real Estate
data.meta_description: Michael Bauer is a PB, COMM, CRS at the Windermere Medford office. Michael Bauer is ready to help you with your real estate needs.
data.text:
By listening to my clients and helping them reach their goals I have built a successful real estate business. Whether you are looking for a starter home, luxury home, farm/ranch or investment property I always offer the same level of quality service.

I have always been a top producing sales agent in the Windermere Van Vleet office and am also among the top 3% in Jackson County. Since 1982, I have attained multi-million dollar recognition yearly, earned a Lifetime Membership in the Million Dollar Club and earned my CRS (Certified Residential Specialist) designation. My success is attributed to a large repeat clientele in the sale or purchase of residential, rural residential, multi-family and commercial sales. I have a Master's degree in finance from San Jose State University which provides me with the skills needed in analyzing investment properties.

I have lived in Southern Oregon for 28 years after moving here from California. My family and I continue to enjoy the many cultural and outdoor activities Southern Oregon has to offer. As a team, my wife and I can provide you the professional and experienced service you should expect.
